content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetIAMPolicy path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/identity/v1/accounts/{account_id}/iam/policy content: params
name accountid
desc an account id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get all account policies
responses
200
identitygetiampolicyresponse
type obj
props
accountid
type str
desc the id of the stackpath account the policy is on
iampolicy
type obj
props
bindings
type arr
policybinding
type obj
props
role
type str
desc the name of the role for this binding formatted as either roles/ltnamegt or accounts/ltidgt/roles/ltnamegt
members
type str
desc the members assigned to the roles in this binding formatted as userltnamegt
desc an assignment of members to roles
desc bindings to assign members to roles
version
type integer
format int64
desc the current update number used to ensure updates happen to the expected version

on first update this must be 0 and on each successive update this must be the last known version when getting or as the result of a set this will be the current version
createdat
type str
format datetime
desc when this policy was created

always present on get ignored on set
readonly true
updatedat
type str
format datetime
desc when this policy was last updated

could be absent on get if not updated since initial creation ignored on set
readonly true
desc a policy on a stackpath resource
desc a response from a request to retrieve a stackpath accounts policy
title: 0_Account Policies_GetIAMPolicy_0.json
